TermsAndConditions.Terms: For £2.50 off your first order (new Deliveroo customers only) register and enter your unique code at checkout on https://deliveroo.co.uk or via the Deliveroo app|The code is valid to 31/3/2020|Minimum spend of £10 applies|Specific menu items subject to availability|Limit of 1 per person|Credit of £2.50 will be redeemed against customer’s first order subject to the minimum spend and cannot be redeemed in conjunction with another discount|See the voucher terms at https://deliveroo.co.uk/legal for full terms|For assistance please contact the Deliveroo Customer Support team at support@deliveroo.co.uk or by telephone on +44 203 699 9977

Offers.OfferTitle: This Half-Term Holiday - Kids Eat for £1 at Stonehouse Pizza & Carvery

TermsAndConditions.Terms: This voucher entitles you to one children’s main meal or carvery for £1 each from our children’s menu on the purchase of an adult main meal. Offer valid Monday to Saturday. Valid from Friday 7th to Saturday 22nd February in Scotland only. Valid from Friday 14th to Friday 28th February in England & Wales. One adult main entitles you to one children’s main for £1, two adult mains entitle you to two children’s mains for £1 each. Valid for up to 4 adults and 4 children. This offer is suitable for children 10 years and under. Simply show the voucher in any participating Stonehouse Pizza and Carvery to redeem this offer. Subject to availability and can't be combined with another discount offer or promotion on the same visit including Groupon or in-restaurant deals. No cash alternative and not valid on takeaway. Promoter is Mitchells & Butlers trading as Stonehouse Pizza and Carvery.

Offers.OfferTitle: This Half Term: Kids Can Eat for Only £1 When You Dine at Toby Carvery

TermsAndConditions.Terms: This voucher entitles you to one children’s main meal, carvery or breakfast for £1 each from our children’s menu on the purchase of an adult main or breakfast. Excludes Sundays and bank holidays. Offer valid Monday to Saturday until Friday 28th February 2020. Valid from Friday 7th February in Scotland only. Valid from Friday 14th February in England & Wales. One adult main entitles you to one children’s main for £1, two adult mains entitle you to two children’s mains for £1 each. Valid for up to 4 adults and 4 children. This offer is suitable for children 12 years and under. Simply show the voucher in any participating Toby Carvery to redeem this offer. Subject to availability and can't be combined with another discount offer or promotion on the same visit including Groupon or in-restaurant deals. No cash alternative and not valid on takeaway. Promoter is Mitchells & Butlers trading as Toby Carvery.
